website_summaries.verdict: Like a sweet treat, Sherbert will brighten your day with fun colors and warm purrs.
pros: White fur with pink, purple, blue, and orange accents
Programmed with fun freeze dance game, as well as up to 50 reactions
Activate by pressing nose or touch sensors
Attach to your backpack, arm or handbag with a twist lock tail
cons: Vibrant colors, but pricier than other options

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Interactive Toy for Kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 Pomsies anticipating the kids wanting them for Christmas. They are cute and cozy, but not quite as soft as I expected. I doubt that will deter the kids' enjoyment. I see these as an upgrade to last year's interactive hit: Fingerlings. (Don't get me wrong. I've bought more fingerlings this year, too) I think, however, that these will appeal a little more to the little girls and boys who prefer to touch and play with soft toys. Fingerlings are cute, but they are not cuddly. The Pomsies are cute and cuddly. I am excited for the kids to open them.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these silly things lol. She likes to wear it around and take care of it. And though she enjoys exploring its different emotions with the changing nose color and all that, there are just too many with too much detail. No one could possibly remember them all so you constantly have to refer back to the manual that comes with it. That's the only reason for 4 stars instead of 5. It's really inexpensive and perfect for gifting to kids in my daughter's class for whom we want to get a birthday present but don't want to spend a ton of money on because...well...there are 20 other kids in her class. That's a lot of presents 😉
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Ames

customer_reviews.title: Cheap garbage. Dont waste money on this. A very cheap stuffed animal with bad fur and poor colors.
customer_reviews.text: Came in an Amazon box too small so now I have a flattened, crushed toy. The fur is cheap and not soft. Package is really poor.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and not as colorful as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: This is no way near as colorful as in the pic. It's more pastel colored than these vivid colors. Also, the interactions are not as exciting as the advertisement makes them sound. It's cute but worth more like $10, not the $25 I paid for it. I can see a kid tiring of this pretty quickly. I'm a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: I Know like I know

customer_reviews.title: Hit with kids
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box I had my doubts about this toy I bought for my 5-year-old granddaughter but she absolutely loves it. I gave it to her Saturday afternoon and it’s Wednesday today- she hasn’t put it down yet. It coos, purrs and the eyes glow. It’s tail wraps around her arm with the round body/face sits in her hand. This toy is a hit!
customer_reviews.author: GSGrandma

customer_reviews.title: So Meowing Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a birthday present and the receiver loved it. I was asked to take "care of it" and immediately fell in love with it. I loved it so much I asked my hubby if I could get a cat and since he hates actual cats, I got one of these. So when I feel like I need to de-stress I Just turn this baby on and listen to it purr... It also sings when it's really happy which is so meowing cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Lou

customer_reviews.title: Don’t spend the extra $10
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, but after I received it, I saw it at Walmart for $10 cheaper. I thought it was more because it was hard to find and loved how colorful it was! I’ve seen it a lot At various times and various Walmart’s.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie F

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget to buy extra batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Fur was a little mushed upon delivery, but we brushed it and it was all fluffy again. Batteries were almost dead upon arrival. Otherwise, a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Smile

customer_reviews.title: The battery tab had been pulled out and it was playing....I bought a new one!
customer_reviews.text: Received my product and the try play strip had already been pulled out. It was talking away. Thought I might send back because I don’t know how long it’s been playing. It was placed with a piece of paper board on top....so any touch it would go off playing for awhile. I just don’t want to waist the trouble and time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it at Walmart
customer_reviews.text: Loved the toy but hated the fact that i paid Amazon over $20 for it and the exact same day mine arrived i bought an identical one at Walmart for $3 . Yes THREE DOLLARS FROM WALMART
customer_reviews.author: Ani Khederian

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as part of my granddaughters Easter basket. She really wanted one and was so excited to get it. They are really cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna R. Gillen

customer_reviews.title: We received this and it never worked. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: We received this and it never worked. I have not contacted the company yet to see about a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Family

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute, at least for my daughter. She now has two of these and when you can find them for around $5 snag them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Huber

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift...
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughters love the Pomsies!! what a great gift for any age.... A++++++++ Highly reccomend these!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Page

customer_reviews.title: I do not get it but..
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand. It is just a fuzzy thing...makes some noise I think BUT it was one of the biggest hits in the gift pile. So, for a 8 year old girl, this thing is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Its Me 1

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed when this arrived. It should cost maybe $9.99 if that.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but arrive with dead batteries
customer_reviews.text: Ordered several as Christmas gifts & all but one arrived with dead batteries. Very annoying - particularly when the packaging must be ripped aart to replace.
customer_reviews.author: NoelleNoelle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my little granddaughters, age 4 & 7. They were not as excited about them as I hoped. There's really not much to do with them. I guess I was expecting more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lani Trezona

customer_reviews.title: everything went well. Decent seller
customer_reviews.text: All order received. All goods are original and well packaged. Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Artem Lysak

customer_reviews.title: Cute and kid friendly
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves it! Worth the price I paid but wouldn't pay the full price in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Was not working
customer_reviews.text: Great concept and cute toy. I sent it to my niece over in Europe and I was watching on video call how she opened her gift and was so excited, just to find out that the toy wasn’t working. Changing the batteries didn’t help either...
customer_reviews.author: David Chesworth

customer_reviews.title: Great little toy!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic toy! My granddaughters loved this! Great price on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: mccally

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: It’s so darn cute. My niece is going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: joyzway

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I am very pleased with it and I can’t wait to give it to my kiddo for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Batteries included
customer_reviews.text: I bought one earlier from a different toy seller on the web & when it came the battery was not included & it wasn’t a geniune product. I’m happy to report that such is not the case with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Anas

customer_reviews.title: The product image is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: The image makes it look like it has vibrant colors but it's very light and not at all vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Beyond

customer_reviews.title: not as shown in pic
customer_reviews.text: it doesnot look as beautiful as it is shown in pic. But it is interactive.
customer_reviews.author: Arsenal

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in time. Kinda cheaper looking and smaller than I anticipated
customer_reviews.author: RVG

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It's so dang cute. I love the eyes and how they change lots of different colors. It also talks and make a noises. Kids adore these.
customer_reviews.author: J Christ

product_meta.title: Pomsies Sherbert
product_meta.description: Interactive pet that lets you know their mood with light up eyes and a wrappable tail
feature_bullets: Up to 50 different sound reactions to pet, cuddle, and tickle

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars161 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
